content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 15.1%) and broad participation (Breadth: 6/8), supportive for cyclicals and momentum.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Retail & Food ABOVE TREND: CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +7.03% | 1M: +17.32%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Banking & Finance CORRECTION/BELOW TREND: ISCTR (1W: -2.00% | 1M: +1.72%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND; Transportation WEAK: PGSUS (1W: -1.56% | 1M: -3.63%) BELOW TREND, TAVHL (1W: -0.61% | 1M: +6.42%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND, MGROS (1W: +9.71% | 1M: +20.28%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND, TSKB (1W: -3.76% | 1M: -0.08%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -2.57% | 1M: -4.56%) BELOW TREND, GUBRF (1W: -2.40% | 1M: +14.03%) CORRECTION, KONTR (1W: -2.32% | 1M: -24.36%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
High momentum names: CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND, MGROS (1W: +9.71% | 1M: +20.28%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Mixed-to-cautious: AKBNK (1W: +1.49% | 1M: +5.94%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: -0.48% | 1M: +3.28%) CORRECTION, ISCTR (1W: -2.00% | 1M: +1.72%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: -3.83% | 1M: -0.60%) BELOW TREND.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry is leading: EREGL (1W: +5.68% | 1M: +5.51%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +7.06% | 1M: +8.38%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +4.26% | 1M: +16.31%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Constructive with pockets of weakness: TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +7.30% | 1M: +21.68%) ABOVE TREND, GUBRF (1W: -2.40% | 1M: +14.03%) CORRECTION, SISE (1W: +1.12% | 1M: +0.10%) ABOVE TREND.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk‑on stance: overweight Retail & Food, Energy and select cyclicals (ASELS, TUPRS, CCOLA); trim lagging small banks and weak transport/tech names (YKBNK, KONTR, PGSUS) and take profits into strength.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
CCOLA (1W: +18.57% | 1M: +24.45%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: +18.41% | 1M: +21.92%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +12.77% | 1M: +17.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +53.86%) ABOVE TREND, TCELL (1W: +7.73% | 1M: +5.67%) ABOVE TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Retail & Food for continuation of momentum, Energy & Chemicals for commodity-driven moves, and Banking to test whether recent weakness is a short pullback or a broader rotation.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 reaction to recent highs for continuation (breakout = bullish) and 20–50 day moving averages for support; watch domestic CPI/data, CBRT commentary, USD/TRY and oil prices as primary catalysts for sector rotation.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low volatility RISK-ON market with 6/8 sectors positive; momentum concentrated in Retail & Food, Energy and select industrials. Trade momentum and cyclicals, hedge or trim lagging banks and transport names ahead of macro data and FX/policy catalysts.
